EnemyInfo.Name: Multiviola
EnemyInfo.Description:
Flying orb found in Norfair. Travels at a fixed velocity until it collides with a wall, then ricochets.
RAM: $0FAC: X motion (pixels) $0FAE: X motion (subpixels) $0FB0: Y motion (pixels) $0FB2: Y motion (subpixels) $0FB4: "Speed 1" (angle, mutable during gameplay)
Submitted by Felicity

Property.Name: Movement Speed
Property.Description: Pixels/frame 00-FF This represents the true distance traveled per frame, radially.

Property.Name: Movement Angle
Property.Description: Angle to travel at. 0h = straight left, 40h = straight up, 80h = straight right, C0 = straight down. Any values 0h-FFh are valid for a more specific angle. The high byte is essentially ignored.
